actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Klamath Falls, Oreg., to the occupants thereof.

summary.text: Provides for the conveyance by quitclaim deed of specified public lands in Klamath Falls, Oregon, to the occupants thereof. Stipulates that such conveyance shall constitute a complete and unconditional waiver of any and all claims against the United States arising from the use of the land by such occupants.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain public lands in Klamath Falls, Oreg., to the occupants thereof.
